markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Ghost Commoner](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3007)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

The ghost commoner is an ordinary person who believes they died unjustly.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Spirit](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=44)): DC 19

**[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=46)): DC 19

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 17

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Ghost_Commoner.webp" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 4">[Ghost Commoner](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3007)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Ghost" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=753" />
<trait label="Incorporeal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=632" />
<trait label="Spirit" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=737" />
<trait label="Undead" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=722" />
<trait label="Unholy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=521" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 161 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Perception** +10; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=59)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Dwelling Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +10, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +12

<row gap="medium">
**Str** -5

**Dex** +3

**Con** +0

**Int** +0

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +2
</row>

**Site Bound** 

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 20 

**Fort** +8 

**Ref** +11 

**Will** +8 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 30
(rejuvenation, [void healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=83))

</row>

**Immunities**
bleed, [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=571) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=578), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=85), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=669), precision, unconscious

**Resistances**
all damage 5 (except [force](/Traits.aspx?ID=610), [_ghost touch_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2840), [spirit](/Traits.aspx?ID=737), or [vitality](/Traits.aspx?ID=509); double resistance vs. non-[magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103))

**Rejuvenation** ([divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=579)) Setting right the injustice that led to the commoner's death allows it to move on to the afterlife.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** fly 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
ghostly hand +13 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)),
**Damage** 2d6+2 void

**Frightful Moan** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16), [Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [Fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) DC 21

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-418" />
name: Ghost Commoner

resistance_raw: all damage 5 (except  force ,   ghost touch  ,  spirit , or  vitality ; double resistance vs. non- magical )
